message: Let's split the money 60/40.  This gives us a good head start and leaves plenty for you in future rounds if you want a better deal.
I think a more even split is fair. 55/45 is a good compromise.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take a smaller cut than my initial offer. 55/45 sounds fair.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. 57/43 is my new offer.
Bob, time is running out, and the money is losing value.  52/48 is my final offer.
